title._content: Blizzard of March 1888 - the "Great Cut" on Hardscrabble Road, opening travel between Chesterfield and West Swanzey

description._content: TITLE Blizzard of March 1888 - the "Great Cut" on Hardscrabble Road, opening travel between Chesterfield and West Swanzey CREATOR French, J.A., Keene NH SUBJECT Blizzards - NH - Keene Snow - NH - Keene DESCRIPTION The "Great Cut" on Hardscrabble Road, opening travel between Chesterfield and West Swanzey New Hampshire. "Photographed during the week following the great storm of March 13, 1888. Several of the views were made before shovel or plow had disturbed the drifts, and others after the streets and walks had been opened." PUBLISHER Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County DATE DIGITAL 20091123 DATE ORIGINAL 1888 RESOURCE TYPE photographs FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER hsykblz017 (HS307-P2398) RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known copyright restrictions.
